desc.p: Must be a valid S.W.I.F.T. code word. This field specifies the Floating Rate Option of the swap transaction. The value in this field should be one of the valid code words as specified in the details for field 14F on MT360s. Input should be in the form ; alpha/alpha/alpha e.g. USD/LIBOR/ISDA or if the code word is not known input should be OTHER. Refer to the SWIFT manual and ISDA definitions for further details.
Multi-language field allowing the user to specify a description for the record.
This field is used as the key to the records on this table.
This field specifies a valid sequence number of the file PERIODIC.INTEREST. This sequence number is part of the key to the PERIODIC.INTEREST rate table.

Must be a valid S.W.I.F.T. code word. This field specifies the Floating Rate Option of the swap transaction. The value in this field should be one of the valid code words as specified in the details for field 14F on MT360s. Input should be in the form ; alpha/alpha/alpha e.g. USD/LIBOR/ISDA or if the code word is not known input should be OTHER. Refer to the SWIFT manual and ISDA definitions for further details.
Multi-language field allowing the user to specify a description for the record.
This field is used as the key to the records on this table.
This field specifies a valid sequence number of the file PERIODIC.INTEREST. This sequence number is part of the key to the PERIODIC.INTEREST rate table.
